issue.title: reset time axis button doesn't work if plot view is scrolled down

content.raw: Note that it's not obvious to me how to fix this. I've tried (previously, and again today) to replicate the behaviour of `on_y_axes_reset` in `on_y_axes_reset` however this just results in the x-axis of the plots getting slightly wider every couple of seconds, which goes on forever and never stops. Only resetting the small plot at the top seems to work, but that of course only works if it's visible (note, this plot is confusingly called the `_hidden_plot` even though it is visible unless hidden by the scroll window)
